author: Brian in Mesa
title: Northern Soul
text: Starring: Elliot James Langridge , Joshua Whitehouse , Lisa Stansfield, Steve Coogan Plot Summary: Before there was Coachella, underground DJs inspired a movement with "Northern Soul." When awkward John Clark (Langridge) is introduced to the feverous energy of American Soul by new friend and local DJ, Matt (Whitehouse), they both begin to dream of a more exciting life. But will the sceneÂ’s underbelly keep them trapped in their boring town, or will the music land them where it all began?
